title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the state of the Lakers after Russell Westbrook gets benched during a disappointing performance against a bad Pacers team. He looks below the surface on the rumors of Jim Harbaugh's return to the NFL and what these really mean for Michigan Football. He talks about the head scratching comments by Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy trying to defend his gaffe at the end of their loss to the 49ers at home in the playoffs. Plus, Bills WR Emmanuel Sanders joins the show to share what makes QB Josh Allen special and what it was like to dominate Bill Belichick and the Patriots in the playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
